about: This industrial monitoring system provides real-time tracking of oil sands levels using computer vision and OPC UA communication. The dashboard displays live measurements with confidence scoring, enabling operators to monitor material levels accurately while maintaining seamless integration with industrial control systems through OPC UA. It supports automated switching between AI predictions and fallback algorithms, ensuring reliable operation even with fluctuating confidence levels. With interactive visualizations and secure browser-based access, this solution delivers a modern, data-driven approach to process monitoring and control.
